scripts.prepare:local: npx tsx copy-artifacts.ts && mustache config/1337.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen
scripts.prepare:testnets: npx tsx copy-artifacts.ts && mustache config/5.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen
scripts.deploy:local: yarn run prepare:local && yarn run create-local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 nezz0746/ns-framework
scripts.deploy:testnets: yarn run prepare:testnets && graph deploy --product hosted-service nezz0746/instate-goerli
